articles.title: Dementia symptoms: Are you reluctant to try this? It could be an early warning sign - Express
articles.description: DEMENTIA is an umbrella term for a cluster of symptoms associated with brain damage. Early warning signs of brain decline can be seen in subtle behavioural changes, including a particular reluctance.
